sentences.sContent: a scarf with a bold floral pattern
sentences.sCn: 印有鲜艳花卉图案的围巾

sentences.sContent: There were floral tributes (= flowers sent as a sign of respect after someone has died ) from his colleagues.

synos.tran: 花的；植物的，植物群的；花似的

trans.tranOther: made of flowers or decorated with flowers or pictures of flowers
